cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Dorms vary from three to six beds per room. Each unit has a fully equipped shared kitchen, lounge and bathroom facilities. All linen is supplied.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Budget Twin rooms feature private bedrooms with twin beds. All of our Budget Twins are located in units with a fully-equipped shared kitchen, lounge and bathroom facilities. All linen and towels are supplied.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A newly renovated room with One King Bed and One Bunk bed. These rooms all come with free Wi-Fi, access to a newly renovated and fully-equipped shared kitchen, lounge and bathroom facilities. All linen and towels are supplied

privates.name: Standard 6 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Budget 3 Bedroom Apartment offers the perfect space for families and groups of friends to get away. This self-contained unit has its own private shower, toilet and fully equipped kitchen. Each unit offers 3 double rooms, accommodating up to 6 people.
